short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily change your location to see search results in an other city, state, or country!  Great for marketing research.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Trying to do market research in other cities or states can be a challenge.  By using this extension, you can modify your search results to show those from another area!  Great for SEO or ads research.
